K10sf68_sc:hart1_0: “pṛccha Bodha d eva yad yad evākāṁkṣasi.”
K10sf68_sc:hart2_0: “katibhir bhadaṁtāṁgaiḥ samanvāgata āryaśrāvakaḥ kṣipram evāsmiṁ dharmavinaye āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti?”
K10sf68_sc:hart3_0: “tena hi Bodha tvām eva pra + + yathā te kṣamate ’thainam vyākuru! kiṁ manyase Bodha
K10sf68_sc:hart3_1: kuśalas tvaṁ pitrye śilpasthānakarmasthāne tadyathāhastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe
K10sf68_sc:hart3_2: sarau dhanuṣy apayāne niryāṇe aṁkuśagrahepāśagrahe toramaragrahe lipigaṇananyasanasaṁkhyāmudrāyāṁ?”
K10sf68_sc:hart4_0: “tathyam ahaṁ bhadanta kuśalaḥ pitrye śilpasthānakarmasthāne tadyathāhasti-grīvāyām
K10sf68_sc:hart4_1: aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe sarau dhanuṣy apayāne niryāṇe aṁkuśagrahetomaragrahe lipigaṇananyasanasaṁkhyāmudrāyām.”
K10sf68_sc:hart5_0: “atha puruṣa āgacchet tasyaivaṁ syāt: kuśalo bata Bodho rājakumāraḥ pitryeśilpasthānakarmasthāne
K10sf68_sc:hart5_1: tadyathāhastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe saraudhanuṣy apayāne niryāṇe aṁkuśagrahe pāśagrahe
K10sf68_sc:hart5_2: tomaragrahe lipigaṇananyasanasaṁkhyāmudrāyāṁ. yanv aham asyāntikād anyatamānyatamaśilpasthānakarmasthānam anvāgamayeyam iti
K10sf68_sc:hart6_0: sa ca syād aśrāddhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tac chrāddhena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt saḥ?”
K10sf68_sc:hart7_0: “sa ca syāc chaṭhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tadṛ śaṭhīna prāptavyanprāpnuyāt sa?”
K10sf68_sc:hart8_0: “sa ca syād bahvābādhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tad alpābādhena prāptavyaṁ prāpnuyāt saḥ?”
K10sf68_sc:hart9_0: “sa ca syād anārabdhavīryaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tad ārabdhavīryeṇaprāptavyaṁ prāpnuyāt sa?”
K10sf68_sc:hart10_0: “sa ca syād duṣprajñaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tat prājñena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt sa?”
K10sf68_sc:hart10_1_0: “no bhadanta; ekaikena tāvad bhadanta ito ’ṅgena samanvāgatena tena puruṣeṇa na sukaraṁ
K10sf68_sc:hart10_1_1: mamāntikād anyatamānyatamaṁ śilpasthāna-karmasthānam anvāgamayituṁ; kaḥ punar vādaḥ sarvaiḥ.”
K10sf68_sc:hart11_0: “dvitīyo .āpuruṣa āgacchet tasyaivaṁ syāt: kuśalo bata Bodho rāja-kumāraḥ pitrye
K10sf68_sc:hart11_1: śilpasthānakarmmasthāne tadyathāhastigrīvāyāṁ aśva-pṛṣṭhe rathe sarau dhanuṣy apayāne
K10sf68_sc:hart11_3: aham asyāntikād anyata-mānyatamac chilpasthānakarmmasthānam anvāgamayeyam iti.
K10sf68_sc:hart12_0: sa ca syāc chrāddhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha yat tac chrāddhena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt sa?”
K10sf68_sc:hart13_0: “sa ca syād aśaṭhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha:  yat tad aśaṭhena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt sa?”
K10sf68_sc:hart14_0: “sa ca syād alpābādhaḥ; kim manyase Bodha: yat tad alpābādhena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt saḥ?”
K10sf68_sc:hart15_0: “sa ca syād ārabdhavīryaḥ; kiṁ manyase  Bodha: yat tad ārabdhavīryeṇaprāptavyaṁ prāpnuyāt sa?” “evaṁ bhadanta.”
K10sf68_sc:hart16_0: “sa ca syāt prājñaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tat prājñena prāptavyaṁ prāpnuyātsa?”
K10sf68_sc:hart16_1_0: “evaṁ bhadanta; ekaikena tāvad bhadanta ito ’ṅgena samanvāgatena tenapuruṣeṇa sukaraṁ
K10sf68_sc:hart16_1_1: mamāntikād anyatamānyatamac chilpasthānakarmasthānasamanvāgamayituṁ; kaḥ punar vādaḥ sarvair.”
K10sf68_sc:hart17_0: “evam eva Bodha paṁcabhiḥ prādhānikāṁgais samanvāgata āryaśrāvakaḥkṣipram evāsmiṁ dharmavinaye āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti; katamaiḥ paṁcabhir?
K10sf68_sc:hart18.1_0: iha Bodha āryaśrāvakasya tathāgatasyāntike śraddhābhiniviṣṭābhavatimū lajātāpratiṣṭhitāasaṁhāryāśramaṇena
K10sf68_sc:hart18.1_1: vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke sahadharmatam;
K10sf68_sc:hart18.2_0: punar aparaṁ + Bodha āryaśrāvako ’śaṭhībhavaty amāyāvīṛjukoṛjukajātīyaḥ sa yathābhū
K10sf68_sc:hart18.2_1: tam ātmānam āviṣkaroti śāstur antike vijñānāṁ casabrahmacārīṇām anena dvitīyena prādhānikenāṁgena
K10sf68_sc:hart18.3_0: punar aparaṁ āryaśrāvaka alpābādho bhavaty arogajātīyaḥ samayāpācanyāgrahaṇyāsamanvāgato
K10sf68_sc:hart18.3_2: paripākaṁ gacchanti; anenatṛtīyena prādhānikāṁgena samanvāgato bhavaty ābhavaty āryaśrāvakaḥ.
K10sf68_sc:hart18.4_0: punar aparaṁ Bodha āryaśrāvakaḥ ārabdhavīryo viharati sthāmavāṁ vīryavānutsāhīdṛḍhaparākramo
K10sf68_sc:hart18.4_1: ’nikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu: kāmaṁ tvak snāyvasthi cāvatiṣṭhatāṁ, pariśuṣyatu
K10sf68_sc:hart18.4_2: śarīrān māṁsaśoṇitam. atha ca punar yattad ārabdhavīryeṇa prāptavyaṁ sthāmavatā vīryavatā
K10sf68_sc:hart18.4_3: utsāhinā dṛḍhaparākrameṇānikṣiptadhureṇa kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tad vata nāprāpyāntarādvīryasya
K10sf68_sc:hart18.4_4: sraṁsanaṁ bhaviṣyaty; anena caturthena prādhānikenāṁgena samana-vāgato bhavaty āryaśrāvakaḥ.
K10sf68_sc:hart18.5_2: anena paṁcamena prādhānikenāṁgena samanvāgato bhavaty āryaśrāvakaḥ.
K10sf68_sc:hart19_0: ebhir Bodha paṁcabhiḥ prādhānikāṁgais samanvāgataḥ āryaśrāvakaḥ kṣipramevāsmiṁ dharmavinaye āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti.”
K10sf68_sc:hart20_0: atha Bodho rājakumāraḥ pū rvaṁ kāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṁ bāhumabhiprasāryāttamanāttamanāudānam
K10sf68_sc:hart20_1: udānayati: “aho buddha aho dharma ahosaṁgha aho dharmasya svākhyātatā, yatredānīṁ
K10sf68_sc:hart20_2: paṁcabhiḥ prādhāni-kāṁgenagaiḥ samanvāgata āryaśrāvakaḥ kṣipram evāsmiṁ dharmavinayeāsravakṣayam anuprāpnotīti!”
